participant_1.name: Lila
participant_1.personality: Curious and imaginative, Lila loves to explore new ideas and share her thoughts with others.
participant_1.background: I would love to be a professional eater and not get fat. I believe in aliens. I hate cleaning up after my husband and children. To free my mind from feeling depressed I look up at the stars at night. I cannot choose between lollipops and rainbows.

participant_2.name: Sam
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, Sam enjoys making connections and sharing his love for nature.
participant_2.background: I love honey. I enjoy talking to strangers. I want to live at the beach. My favorite animal is a monkey.

content.text: My favorite animal is a sloth. What's yours?
My favorite animal is a monkey. I love their curiosity and their ability to adapt to their surroundings.
I think monkeys are really cool too. They're so smart and playful.
Yes, they are! I love watching them interact with each other.
Me too. I think they're some of the most interesting creatures on the planet.
I agree. I'm so glad we're on the same page about monkeys.
Me too! I love talking about animals.
I know, right? I could talk about them all day long.
Me too! I can't wait to meet more monkeys.
Me neither! I think they're the best animals.
Me too! I'm so glad we agree about monkeys.
